title: University of Toronto's Martin on New Book
itunes:title: University of Toronto's Martin on New Book
description:
Roger L. Martin, Professor Emeritus at the Rotman School of Management at University of Toronto, discusses his book "When More Is Not Better: Overcoming America’s Obsession With Economic Efficiency."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
